name: One Piece Red Wrath of Shanks
name_original: One Piece Red Wrath of Shanks
description:
Input:

WASD - Move Character

Left Mouse Click - Attack

Z - Release Haoshoku Haki

This game is free, fanmade game just for fun and study purpose. Warning do not resell!
